mapper.select: SELECT ENAME, E_JOB FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = #{empno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( ATT_CODE , GO_WORK , EMPNO ) VALUES ( (SELECT 'ATT_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ATT_CODE, 7))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM ATTENDANCE) , SYSDATE , #{empno} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET OUT_WORK = SYSDATE, WORKING_STATUS = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI:SS') > '09:10:00' THEN 2 WHEN GO_WORK IS NULL THEN 3 ELSE 1 END WHERE ATT_CODE = (SELECT 'ATT_' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ATT_CODE, 7))), 0), 3, '0') FROM ATTENDANCE) AND EMPNO = #{empno}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH:MI') AS GO_WORK FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE GO_WORK >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY GO_WORK DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT TO_CHAR(OUT_WORK, 'HH:MI') AS OUT_WORK FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE OUT_WORK >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY OUT_WORK DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) AS LATE_COUNT FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI:SS') > '09:10:00' AND EMPNO = #{empno}
SELECT ROUND(SUM(OUT_WORK - GO_WORK) * 24) AS WORKING_DAYS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT ROUND(SUM( CASE WHEN OUT_WORK - GO_WORK > (FIX_TIME - TRUNC(FIX_TIME)) THEN OUT_WORK - GO_WORK - (FIX_TIME - TRUNC(FIX_TIME)) ELSE 0 END) * 24) AS OVER_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS LATE_COUNT FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TRUNC(GO_WORK) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND GO_WORK IS NULL AND TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'D') NOT IN (1, 7) AND TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYY-MM-DD') NOT IN ( '2023-01-01', -- 신정 '2023-02-16', -- 설날 '2023-02-17', -- 설날 '2023-02-18', -- 설날 '2023-03-01', -- 삼일절 '2023-05-05', -- 어린이날 '2023-05-09', -- 석가탄신일 '2023-06-06', -- 현충일 '2023-08-15', -- 광복절 '2023-09-14', -- 추석 '2023-09-15', -- 추석 '2023-09-16', -- 추석 '2023-10-03', -- 개천절 '2023-10-09' -- 한글날 ) AND EMPNO = #{empno}

SELECT TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORKING, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'DY') AS DAY, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS WORKING_TIME, TO_CHAR(OUT_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS OUT_TIME, CASE WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 1 THEN '정상출근' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 2 THEN '지각' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 3 THEN '결근' END AS WORKING_STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY GO_WORK DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROW ONLY

SELECT TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WORKING, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'DY') AS DAY, TO_CHAR(GO_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS WORKING_TIME, TO_CHAR(OUT_WORK, 'HH24:MI') AS OUT_TIME, CASE WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 1 THEN '정상출근' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 2 THEN '지각' WHEN WORKING_STATUS = 3 THEN '결근' END AS WORKING_STATUS FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY GO_WORK DESC
